CustomField.formula:
IF( AND( CONTAINS(Name, "Virtual"), CONTAINS(Name, "202") ), CASE( MOD(Event_Start_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ), 1, Event_Start_Date__c- 42, 2, Event_Start_Date__c- 42, 3, Event_Start_Date__c- 42, 4, Event_Start_Date__c- 42, 5, Event_Start_Date__c- 42, null ), CASE( MOD(Event_Start_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ), 1, Event_Start_Date__c- 20 - 50, 2, Event_Start_Date__c- 20 - 50, 3, Event_Start_Date__c- 20 - 50, 4, Event_Start_Date__c- 20 - 50, 5, Event_Start_Date__c- 20 - 50, null ) )
/* ORIGINAL FORMULA PRE-9/9/2020 EDIT PER TICKET #25944: CASE( MOD(Event_Start_Date__c - DATE( 1900, 1, 7 ), 7 ), 1, Event_Start_Date__c- 20 - 50, 2, Event_Start_Date__c- 20 - 50, 3, Event_Start_Date__c- 20 - 50, 4, Event_Start_Date__c- 20 - 50, 5, Event_Start_Date__c- 20 - 50, null ) */
CustomField.label: Anchor Deadline
